name: Dodge-Tomato
description:
They are insulting, yelling, and throwing tomatoes at you. Why won't they just leave you alone...  Duck and dodge to avoid the tomatoes that are being thrown at you!

MADE IN 3 HOURS FOR TRIJAM #152 WITH THEME "LEAVE ME ALONE":

Fits the theme because the character just wants to be left alone, but tomatoes keep getting thrown at them.

All assets made by me, except for sounds which are from ZapSplat.com

I didn't get time to add any music :(

DEVLOG COMING THIS WEEK (hopefully)

CONTROLS:

  • Up arrow, W, or space to jump.
  • Down arrow or S to duck/crouch.
